description: Nicole Holofcener narrates a sequence from her film featuring Ben Mendelsohn.
title: ‘The Land of Steady Habits’ | Anatomy of a Scene

text: Film directors walk viewers through one scene of their movies, showing the magic, motives and the mistakes from behind the camera.
